偰字的基本解释

偰
xiè
同“契”。

偰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］
［《廣韻》先結切，入屑，心。］
(1)相传为殷代始祖之名。
(2)姓。元有偰文质，见《元史》。

偰字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　偰； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页111第29
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【正韻】?先結切，音屑。【說文】高辛氏子，堯司徒，殷之先也。通借契。　又姓。元偰列篪，本回鶻人，後居溧陽，兄弟五人俱登進士。明吏部尚書偰斯。

偰字的起名意思

通“楔”。楔子。

xiè

偰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］
["Guangyun" first knots, cuts, and heart. ]
(1) According to legend, it is the name of the ancestor of the Yin Dynasty.
(2) Last name. Yuan has literary qualities, see "Yuan History".
偰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　偰; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 111 29
[Ancient text]? [Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun]? First knot and cut, sound scraps. [Said the text] Gao Xin's son, Yao Situ, Yin Zhixian. Through loan deed.　Another last name. Yuan Xie Lieqi, a native of Uighur, lived in Liyang later, and all five of his brothers were enrolled in Jinshi. The official book of the Ming dynasty.
